sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CATBTERT( TERT_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), TERT_STND_GUBN CHAR(1), TERT_STND_DEGR VARCHAR(10), TERT_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0), TERT_TERM_CODE VARCHAR(8), TERT_SPM0_REMK VARCHAR(10), TERT_SHAP_REMK VARCHAR(100), TERT_ADD0_REMK VARCHAR(50), TERT_APPL_GUBN VARCHAR(1), TERT_REMK VARCHAR(200), TERT_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), TERT_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), TERT_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), TERT_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), CONSTRAINT CATBTERT_PK PRIMARY KEY ( TERT_CORP_CODE, TERT_STND_GUBN, TERT_STND_DEGR, TERT_SEQ0 ) )
